mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPLY ( MEMBER_SEQ, DATE, CONTENTS, ARTICLE_SEQ, REPLY_SEQ) VALUES ( (SELECT SEQ FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME=#{reply.NICKNAME}), #{reply.DATE}, #{reply.CONTENTS}, #{reply.ARTICLE_SEQ}, (SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM TB_REPLY TMP WHERE ARTICLE_SEQ = #{reply.ARTICLE_SEQ}) )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_SEQ, R.CONTENTS, R.DATE, M.NICKNAME, R.ARTICLE_SEQ FROM TB_REPLY R INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_SEQ = M.SEQ WHERE #{id}=ARTICLE_SEQ
SELECT R.REPLY_SEQ, R.CONTENTS, R.DATE, M.NICKNAME FROM TB_REPLY R INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_SEQ = M.SEQ WHERE #{seq}=REPLY_SEQ AND #{article_seq}=ARTICLE_SEQ
